#include <iostream>
#include <stdio.h>
#include <algorithm>
#include <vector>

using namespace std;

typedef unsigned long long int Lint;

int main() {
	
	Lint t, n, k, sum, ct, i, val;
	scanf("%llu\n", &t );
	
	while( t-- ) {
		
		scanf("%llu %llu", &n, &k );
		vector<Lint> A( n );
		
		for( i = 0;i < n;i++ ) 	
			scanf("%llu", &A[ i ] );
		scanf("\n");
		
		sum = 0;
				
		sort( A.rbegin(), A.rend() );
		
		for( i = 0;i < k;i++ )
			sum += A[ i ];
			
		printf( "%llu\n", sum );
	}
	
	return 0;
}
